description: Allows for increasing or decreasing volumes a specified number of times

volumeUp.description: Emulate pressing 'volume up' X number of times, where X is the 'repetition' value

repetition.description: The number of times to execute 'volume up'

volumeDown.description: Emulate pressing 'volume down' X number of times, where X is the 'repetition' value

repetition.description: The number of times to execute 'volume down'
